script.name: plugin.bbs.econnews
script.sourceplaintext:
if not $tVariables $tVariables = table alloc end
if is datatype[ $a.object ] == DATATYPE_RACE $owner = $a.object else if $a.object -> exists $owner = $a.object -> get owner race if $a.object -> is of class Sector $sector = $a.object else $sector = $a.object -> get sector $name = $a.object -> get name if $a.object -> is of class Station $tVariables['$STATION$'] = $name else if $a.object -> is of class Ship $tVariables['$SHIP$'] = $name end end end
skip if $a.subtype $a.subtype = 0
$owner.id = get race id for race: $owner if $sector -> exists $sector.name = $sector -> get name $tVariables['$SECTOR$'] = $sector.name end
if $a.ware $text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $a.ware, null, null, null, null $tVariables['$WARE$'] = $text end
* get the race name if exists $value = 100 + $owner.id if read text: page id=$a.pageid, id=$value exists $racename = sprintf: pageid=$a.pageid textid=$value, null, null, null, null, null else $racename = sprintf: fmt='%s', $owner, null, null, null, null end $tVariables['$GOVERNMENT1$'] = $racename
* get the government name if exists $value = 150 + $owner.id if read text: page id=$a.pageid, id=$value exists $govname = sprintf: pageid=$a.pageid textid=$value, null, null, null, null, null else $govname = sprintf: fmt='%s', $owner, null, null, null, null end $tVariables['$GOVERNMENT2$'] = $govname
gosub sub.GetRandomName $tVariables['$PERSON1$'] = $name gosub sub.GetRandomName $tVariables['$PERSON2$'] = $name
$name = get player name $tVariables['$PLAYER$'] = $name
* get a random authors name gosub sub.GetRandomName $tVariables['$AUTHOR$'] = $name
* fill out the content data $tData = table alloc
* Get the first set of data $id = 200000 gosub sub.GetOrder $i = size of array $order while $i dec $i = $s = $order[$i] $value = ( 10000 * ( $a.subtype + 1 ) ) + ( 100 * $i ) $default.value = 10000 + ( 100 * $i )
gosub sub.GetRandomArticle $tData[$s] = $read.text end
* Get the second set of data $id = 200002 gosub sub.GetOrder $i = size of array $order $done = [FALSE] while $i dec $i = $s = $order[$i] $value = 3000000 + ( 10000 * ( $a.subtype + 1 ) ) + ( 100 * $i ) $default.value = 3000000 + 10000 + ( 100 * $i ) if not $done gosub sub.GetRandomArticle $done = [TRUE] else if $is.default.value $value2 = $default.value + $rnd else $value2 = $value + $rnd end $read.text = read text: page=$a.pageid id=$value2 end $tData[$s] = $read.text end
* get the main article text $article.text = read text: page=$a.pageid id=1000000
* replace the tags with the data $key = get next key: table=$tData key=null while $key $text = $tData[$key] $article.text = substitute in string $article.text: pattern $key with $text $key = get next key: table=$tData key=$key end
* replace any variables $key = get next key: table=$tVariables key=null while $key $text = $tVariables[$key] $article.text = substitute in string $article.text: pattern $key with $text $key = get next key: table=$tVariables key=$key end
return $article.text
sub.GetOrder: $text = read text: page=$a.pageid id=$id $strs = split string: $text separator='[' $order = array alloc: size=0 $i = size of array $strs while $i dec $i = $s = $strs[$i] if get length of string $s $s = '[' + $s insert $s into array $order at index 0 end end endsub
sub.GetRandomArticle: $is.default.value = [FALSE] $j = 0 $value2 = $value + $j while read text: page id=$a.pageid, id=$value2 exists inc $j = $value2 = $value + $j end
if $j == 0 AND $value != $default.value $value = $default.value gosub sub.GetRandomArticle $is.default.value = [TRUE] endsub else if $j == 0 $read.text = ' ' endsub end
$rnd = random value from 0 to $j - 1 $value2 = $value + $rnd $read.text = read text: page=$a.pageid id=$value2 endsub
sub.GetRandomName: $is.female = [FALSE] if $owner == Argon OR $owner == Terran OR $owner == OTAS OR $owner == TerraCorp OR $owner == ATF OR $owner == Darkspace skip if random value from 0 to 3 - 1 $is.female = [TRUE] end $name = get random name: race=$owner, female=$is.female endsub
return null

comment.var: get the race name if exists
get the government name if exists
Get the first set of data
Get the second set of data
replace the tags with the data

sval.val: get the race name if exists
get the government name if exists
Get the first set of data
Get the second set of data
replace the tags with the data
